[]{#TOP}

PROGRAM *restart\_file\_tool*
=============================

+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------+
| ![DART project                    | Jump to [DART Documentation Main  |
| logo](../../../documentation/imag | Index](../../../documentation/ind |
| es/Dartboard7.png){height="70"}   | ex.html)\                         |
|                                   | version information for this      |
|                                   | file:\                            |
|                                   | \$Id\$                            |
+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------+

Overview
--------

This tool still exists in the "Classic" release of DART but is no longer
needed in the "Manhattan" release. DART initial condition and restart
files are now in NetCDF format and any standard NetCDF tool can be used
to manipulate them.

[]{#Legalese}
